#summary This tutorial shows how to install KOALA in an AppScale 1.4 PaaS that runs inside EC2

[http://koalacloud.appspot.com KOALA] can run inside a Private Cloud PaaS with [http://appscale.cs.ucsb.edu AppScale]. 

This tutorial shows how to start AppScale 1.4 inside EC2 and upload KOALA into the AppScale PaaS.

= What AppScale is ==

AppScale is a platform that allows users to deploy and host their own Google App Engine applications. AppScale executes automatically over [http://aws.amazon.com/ec2/ Amazon EC2] and [http://open.eucalyptus.com Eucalyptus] as well as [http://www.xen.org Xen] and [http://www.linux-kvm.org KVM] and supports both the python and java Google App Engine platforms.

= Installation of AppScale and KOALA = 

At first you neet do install the [http://code.google.com/p/appscale/wiki/AppScale_Tools_Usage AppScale Tools].
